text: addēhaṁ paṟaññu: "enṟe janamē, niṅṅaḷ ālēāciccu nēākkiyiṭṭuṇṭēā? ñānenṟe nāthanil ninnuḷḷa spaṣṭamāya pramāṇaṅṅaḷ muṟuke piṭikkunnavanāṇ; avan tanṟe anugrahamenikk tannirikkunnu; niṅṅaḷkkat kāṇān kaḻiyunnilleṅkil ñānentu ceyyānāṇ? niṅṅaḷkkat iṣṭamillātirikke niṅṅaḷataṅgīkarikkān ñaṅṅaḷ nirbandhikkukayēā
